co.codecraft.jcircuit

Interface Circuit.Listener

  • Enclosing class:
    Circuit

    public static interface Circuit.Listener
    Receive notifications just after the circuit changes state (e.g., from CLOSED to OPEN). Processing these events should be very fast and light, to avoid bogging down the circuit breaker.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCircuitTransition(Circuit circuit, int oldState, int newState) 

    • Method Detail

      • onCircuitTransition

        void onCircuitTransition(Circuit circuit,
                         int oldState,
                         int newState)
        Parameters:
        circuit - The Circuit that has changed.
        oldState - The previous state. This will be one of the following constants: CLOSED, OPEN, RESETTING, or FAILED.
        newState - The new state. This will be one of the following constants: CLOSED, OPEN, RESETTING, or FAILED.
